query:
SELECT
      r."name" AS "name!",
      (
        SELECT COUNT(x.*)
        FROM (
          SELECT DISTINCT ON (o."title", o."partner") 1
          FROM c_opportunity o
          WHERE
            c_opportunity_is_current(o) AND
            ST_Intersects(r.geometry, o.location_point)
          ORDER BY o."title", o."partner"
        ) x
      ) AS "point!",
      (
        SELECT COUNT(x.*)
        FROM (
          SELECT DISTINCT ON (o."title", o."partner") 1
          FROM c_opportunity o
          WHERE
            c_opportunity_is_current(o) AND
            ST_Intersects(r.geometry, o.location_polygon)
          ORDER BY o."title", o."partner"
        ) x
      ) AS "polygon!"
      FROM c_region r
